heading: HB00535
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING A STATE-OF-THE-ART AND HIGHLY SCIENTIFIC SPORTS COMPLEX KNOWN AS THE "NATIONAL AMATEUR SPORTS TRAINING CENTER", AND FUNDING FOR THE ACQUISITION OF PROPERTY, CONSTRUCTION OF FACILITIES INCLUDING ADMINISTRATION, MAINTENANCE, AND MANAGEMENT OF THE SAME, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
short-title: National Amateur Sports Training Center Act Of 2016
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA11214 enacted on 2019-02-14 Substituted by HB05615
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00535
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A STATE-OF-THE-ART AND HIGHLY SCIENTIFIC SPORTS COMPLEX KNOWN AS THE "NATIONAL AMATEUR SPORTS TRAINING CENTER", AND FUNDING FOR THE ACQUISITION OF PROPERTY, CONSTRUCTION OF FACILITIES INCLUDING ADMINISTRATION, MAINTENANCE, AND MANAGEMENT OF THE SAME, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : National Amateur Sports Training Center Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Aims to replace the outdated Rizal Memorial Sports Complex to increase the chance of national players in international contests.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GONZAGA, RUWEL PETER S.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Others

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-09-27
          -Sent invitation letters to concerned agencies and requested their position papers.
      2. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2016-10-19
          -Initial deliberation. First mother Committee meeting. Created TWG to consolidate HB Nos. 535, 545,1907 and 3447.
      3. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2016-10-19
          -Spot report submitted.
          -First mother Committee meeting. Created TWG to consolidate HB Nos. 535, 545,1907 and 3447.
      4. Referred to the Technical Working Group (TWG) on 2016-11-03
          -TWG highlights submitted.
      5. Draft of Substitute/Amended/Consolidated Measure prepared on 2016-11-14
      6. Measure approved by the Committee on 2016-11-16
          -Spot report submitted.
          -Approved by the Mother Committee. Prepared Substitute Bill, in substitution to HB Nos. 535, 545, 1907 and 3447. Referred to the Committee on Appropriations for comments on November 16, 2016.
      7. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2016-11-16
          -Transmitted to Committee on Appropriations for comments
      8. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-03-07
      9. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-03-07
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 535, 545, 1907 and 3447 was approved with amendments.
      10. Recommendations transmitted to the committee of referral on 2017-03-07
      11. Fact Sheet prepared on 2017-03-20
          -
      12. Draft of Committee Report and Attachments/Inquiries/Impeachment/Ethics Complaint prepared on 2017-03
      13. Transmittal memo prepared on 2017-03-22
      14. Committee Report approved on 2017-04-24
      15. Committee Report Signed by the Chairperson on 2017-05-08
      16. Committee Report Signed by the Chairperson on 2017-05-10
      17. Prepared and Transmitted the required copies of Committee Report on 2017-05-11
      18. Committee Report filed on 2017-05-11
      19. Referred the Committee Report to the Committee on Rules (OB) on 2017-05-15
      20. Deliberated by the Conference Committee on 2018-11-28
      21. Conference Committee Report filed on 2018-12-05
